Description:
Required skills to be successfulAt least 2 years’ experience as a General Repair / Diagnostic Technician coming from automotive dealerships
Experience with express & periodic maintenance, pre-delivery Inspection, AC Re-gas, alternator tests, battery tests, tyers & wheel balancing and alignment
Able to read, understand and write English well enough to follow mandated trainings and standard instructions.
Conversant in English About the teamThe role will report to the Workshop Manager, and you will be working in a busy workshop environment wherein you will be dealing directly with Service Advisor, Controller, Foreman & co-Technicians in a daily basis. What equips you for the roleDiploma Technical certification, ITI (Industrial Training Institute NCVT Certificate) or ITC 
2 to 3 years’ experience as a General Technician
Added value in having valid UAE driving license
Must read, interpret and transcribe data in order to maintain accurate records in job orders
Must be conversant in English Job Details
